lesson: Implemented SOLARIA Agency methodology from BRIK-64 project - Zero technical debt, Spec-Driven Development, PAT-006 API verification mandatory
Created 3 specialized agents: project-coordinator (orchestration), strapi-cms-architect (backend), testing-automation-specialist (TDD)
Implemented CSS Grid auto-fit + clamp() for fluid responsive design - smooth adaptation from 375px to 2560px without discrete breakpoints
Migrated from Payload CMS to Strapi 4.x via Docker - eliminated macOS @swc/core code signature issues, production-ready from day 1
